attributes.action: Remember the sacrifice the NHS staff and Social Care Wirkers made saving us.
attributes.additional_details: Vote to nominate a public holiday to remember their service and sacrifice. I nominate the anniversary of the soul of the NHS, Florence Nightingale (12 May 1820 – 13 August 1910) - Parliament may choose.
attributes.background: There will come a time when we will need to remember the sacrifices the staff of the NHS and our social care services have made. Many will have paid the ultimate price, some will suffer emotional pain forever. Much like like the military  personnel who fought and protected us through the years.
